text: @va_shiva @realDonaldTrump Way to misquote. He says the rate is "less than 1%," not 0.1%. Data from the NYC seroly suggests a realistic CFR of 0.5%, which is 5-10X higher than seasonal flu. If 60% of Americans were to get COVID-19 at 0.5% CFR, that would be 1.7 million dead Americans.
